titre: Timer for Working Out - LED Lights
intro: Inspired from: https://www.instructables.com/Flowing-LED-Lights-W... Topic: I am making a timer for people who are doing workouts. For example, people can't look at their phones when they are doing workouts that need to stay on the ground. In this situation, my product will be able for people to know the time they have spent. Changes: I changed "wait for 100ms" of delay to "wait for 1000ms", changed "wait for 100ms" of delay to "wait for 50ms", changed "wait for 100ms" of delay to "wait for 150ms", 把秒數由500改至1000. Code: https://create.arduino.cc/editor/irene1026/05b6a2b...

1. Step 1: Build the Circuit

Étapes :

  1. 1. Plug wires required for these steps into the spots they should work.
  2. 2. First plug one wire from "2" to the negative (-).
  3. 3. The eight LEDs are connected to pin 2-pin 9.
  4. 4. High level and the corresponding LED at the pins will light up.
  5. 5. Control the time of each LED brightening and you will see flowing LED lights.
